title: Me Gusta
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Organic, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Has a weekly changing seasonal menu; always has vegan choices. Offers a local and international kitchen, with healthy and wholesome ingredients. Gluten free and dairy free dishes are available. Uses mainly organic products and special requests are possible since everything is made-in-house to order.
